title: Untold Truth of the Amazon KDP Best Seller
description:
It’s high time I shined a light on what a lot of newbie self-publishers should know about Kindle best sellers. I’m going to share my thoughts on the Kindle best seller, AND how most of the Kindle rank tracker and Kindle best seller calculator software out there may not do you any good.

It’s not all bad news, I assure you, but you need to know more about the myth behind Kindle Best Sellers and how ranking ain’t all it’s cracked up to be.
